title: 01/18/21 DPS Hour 3
itunes:title: 01/18/21 DPS Hour 3
description:
Dan talks about how he does not like the rule that gives the ball to the defense when the offense fumbles out of the back of the end zone. Dan says he would like to see the ball stay with the offense, loss of down, and the ball placed on the 25 yard line.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
